strapiPost.title: Razorback Softball Team Set Up To Make Program History
strapiPost.content:
After yet another big victory on Sunday, the Arkansas softball team is heading into the NCAA Super Regionals this week at Bogle Park.

  • Where to watch: Arkansas will be playing Texas in the Fayetteville Super Regionals, and their first game is on Thursday, May 26, at 6p CT on ESPN2. Friday’s game will be at 5:30p on ESPN. Any individual in-person game tickets will be made available on the morning of that day’s game, and you can contact the Razorback Ticket Center at 479-575-5151.
  • Making history: If Arkansas wins the Super Regionals, they will make program history and be the first Arkansas softball team to go to the Women’s College World Series. 

Stay updated HERE.
